subject: Re: Gateway MT6451
body:
On Wed, 18 Apr 2007 13:43:53 -0300
"Andre Novelli"  wrote:

> >
> >
> > Please don't top post, and please reply to the list, not to me.
> 
> 
> Ok! I didn't know about top posting, and made a brief search about it so I
> ask you pardon for my mistake.

No problem; I didn't mean to be rude, just helpful.
 
> I don't know much about sound, so I'll leave that for other list
> > members. There's kernel support for some TI mmc/sd readers (see Device
> > drivers/Misc devices and Device drivers/MMC / SD Card support) but I
> > have no experience with it. A quick google for "Broadcom Dell 1390
> > wireless" indicates that it's a rebranded Broadcom 43xx chip, so it
> > might work with the (in mainline kernel) bcm43xx driver. It should
> > certainly work with ndiswrapper.
> 
> 
> I will try to make my wireless card work with this driver.
> I work with multimedia so I need the sound working, I will try to make it
> work with Etch until have success :D
> 
> Thanks for your help!
> 

Let us know how it goes, or if you need further help!

Celejar
